page.title: 04A Family Sunday, Sodylt
page.content: In this family there are three people. The father works on his farm and his youngest son helps him. He gets up at 7.00 am and milks the cows and sees to his other animals. The mother gets up at 9.00 am and gets breakfast for herself, her husband and their son. At 9.45 am Mrs Parry goes to Ellesmere Hospital to play the organ for the elderly. At 11.00 am she gets home and gets a proper Sunday dinner for the family. Most Sundays some of the other members of the family come to dinner and also the son's girl friend. They stay in all afternoon, or they might go out for a drink, or go horse riding. Milking time is at 4.00 pm.The family might go home or stay for tea, when the farmer comes in around 6.00 pm. In the evening the parents watch the TV.
